Description.div: Order that is priced.
Currency in which the prices are returned.
Indicates the Customer ID on which behalf pricing inquiry is made.
The EnterpriseCode on which behalf pricing inquiry is being made.
The price of the order before shipping and order adjustments. It is sum of LinePrice from all non information lines in the order.
Sum of adjustments obtained by pricing order total rules and coupons.
The OrderReference is the Order Header Key.
The price of the order. OrderTotal = Subtotal + AdjustedShippingTotal.
Pricing is being checked on behalf of the organization specified by OrganizationCode.
Date on which the pricing is requested.
The price of the order before shipping adjustments. Subtotal = LinePriceTotal + OrderAdjustment.
Indicates whether the rule execution is suppressed or not.
Indicates whether the shipping calculation logic is suppressed or not.
The manual adjustment, coupon or pricing rule which has resulted in this adjustment.
Total adjustment applied as because of pricing rule or coupon or the manual adjustment.
Total adjustment applicable because of pricing rule or coupon or manual adjustment.

The identifier of an adjustment.
Possible Values:
PricingRuleName - If adjustment has occurred because of a pricing rule.
CouponID - If adjustment has occurred because of a coupon.
AdjustmentID - Manual adjustment identifier provided in the input.
Quantity of items to which this adjustment is applicable.

For header level free gift promotions, indicates free gift quantity that may still be applied. If StatusMsgCode is YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED but AwardQuantity is not present, then applicable quantity is unspecified.
The charge category. This attribute is used in the input of YPMOverrideGetOrderPrice User Exit.
The name of the charge. This attribute is used in the input of YPMOverrideGetOrderPrice User Exit.
Indicates whether the adjustment is manual or not.

Used by user exit to add a new manual adjustment to the order, or remove an existing manual adjustment from the order.
Valid Values:
ADD - Adds a new manual adjustment to the order.
REMOVE - Removes an existing adjustment from the order
The default behavior is ADD .

Indicates the status of the rule validation and application on the order. Following table lists the possible status codes:
YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED Free gift was not selected or only partially selected for rule. AwardQuantity attribute indicates the free gift quantity that can be applied for this rule. None.
Action of the pricing rule which is performed to generate the adjustment.
The manual adjustment, coupon or pricing rule which has resulted in this adjustment.
Total adjustment applied as because of pricing rule or coupon or the manual adjustment.
Total adjustment applicable because of pricing rule or coupon or manual adjustment.

The identifier of an adjustment.
Possible Values:
PricingRuleName - If adjustment has occurred because of a pricing rule.
CouponID - If adjustment has occurred because of a coupon.
AdjustmentID - Manual adjustment identifier provided in the input.
Quantity of items to which this adjustment is applicable.

For header level free gift promotions, indicates free gift quantity that may still be applied. If StatusMsgCode is YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED but AwardQuantity is not present, then applicable quantity is unspecified.
The charge category. This attribute is used in the input of YPMOverrideGetOrderPrice User Exit.
The name of the charge. This attribute is used in the input of YPMOverrideGetOrderPrice User Exit.
Indicates whether the adjustment is manual or not.

Used by user exit to add a new manual adjustment to the order, or remove an existing manual adjustment from the order.
Valid Values:
ADD - Adds a new manual adjustment to the order.
REMOVE - Removes an existing adjustment from the order
The default behavior is ADD .

Indicates the status of the rule validation and application on the order. Following table lists the possible status codes:
YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED Free gift was not selected or only partially selected for rule. AwardQuantity attribute indicates the free gift quantity that can be applied for this rule. None.
Total adjustment applied at the line.
Total adjustment applicable for the line.
Adjustment for the line.
Adjustment for every unit of line item.
Unique identifier for the line.
Action of the pricing rule which is performed to generate the adjustment.

Unique identifier of a coupon.
CouponID is not passed.

Indicates the status of the coupon validation and application on the order. Following table lists the possible coupon status codes:
CouponStatusMsgCode Description Coupon Status Attributes returned
YPM_RULE_VALID The coupon is valid. None
YPM_RULE_INVALID The coupon does not exist. None
YPM_RULE_NOT_ACTIVE The coupon is not active.
PricingStatus of the coupon
YPM_RULE_NOT_YET_EFFECTIVE The coupon is not yet active.
StartDateActive of the coupon
YPM_RULE_EXPIRED The coupon is expired.
EndDateActive of the coupon
YPM_RULE_BAD_CUSTOMER The coupon is not assigned to the CustomerID
CustomerID passed in the input. A blank CustomerID indicates that the coupon has no assignments with void CustomerID for the SelectionCriteria.
YPM_RULE_BAD_REGION The coupon is not assigned to the passed RegionKey or PersonInfo
RegionKey passed or derived based on PersonInfo from the input. A blank RegionKey indicates that the coupon has no assignments with void RegionKey for the SelectionCriteria.
YPM_RULE_BAD_ATTRIBUTE The coupon is not assigned to the passed customer attribute Any one of the input CustomerType, RelationshipType, Vertical or any extended attribute of the YPM_PRICING_RULE_ASSIGNMENT that didn't match the coupon assignments. A blank attribute value indicates that the coupon has no assignments with void value for the SelectionCriteria of that customer attribute.
YPM_RULE_TARGET_SKU_MISSING The item on which this coupon applies adjustments does not exist in this order
TargetItemID and TargetUnitOfMeasure of the coupon.
YPM_RULE_BAD_MIN_NO_OF_SHIPMENTS This coupon does not apply as the MinimizeNumberOfShipments flag on the coupon does not match of that in the order.
MinimizeNumberOfShipments flag of the rule associated with the coupon.
YPM_RULE_BAD_SHIP_METHOD This coupon does not apply as the CarrierServiceCode does not match that of the order.
CarrierServiceCode of the rule associated with the coupon.
YPM_RULE_EXCLUSIVE_COUPON_ORDER This is an exclusive coupon. Another coupon has already applied adjustments on the coupons' target*.
CouponID that's already applied.
YPM_RULE_EXCLUSIVE_COUPON_ALREADY_ORDER An exclusive coupon has already applied adjustments on the coupon's target*.
CouponID that's already applied.
YPM_RULE_CONDITION_NOT_SATISFIED The coupon condition is not satisfied. Hence the rule is not fired. None.
YPM_RULE_NOT_APPLIED Even though the coupon is valid and condition is satisfied the coupon is not applied. For example: The coupon is providing a flat fee that is greater than the shipping charge of the order. None.
*A item targeted coupon is exclusive with another item targeted coupon only, it is not exclusive with an order total coupon. The exclusivity is also is similar for an order total coupon.
Indicates whether the coupon is exclusive or not.
Indicates whether the coupon is an item rule or not.
Overrides the entire adjustment for the rule. If supplied the value of this attribute will be the adjustment applied.
Value of this attribute will override maximum adjustment limit defined for Coupon.
Indicates whether the coupon is valid or not.
Name of the attribute on the coupon or in the input due to which the coupon is not applicable.
Value of the attribute.
Priced order line.
Absolute uplift or discount on the ListPrice.
The delivery method for the order line.
Indicates that the order line is eligible for shipping charge discounts.
The price for this order line before any rule adjustments are accounted for. ExtendedPrice = UnitPrice * Quantity.
Indicates whether the order line price is for information only.
Indicates whether the UnitPrice for the order line is locked or not.
Indicates whether the order line is related with the custom pricing rule or not.
Item identifier.
Sum of manual adjustments and adjustments generated by item targeted rules and coupons.
Unique identifier for the line.
The price of the line. LinePrice = ExtendedPrice + LineAdjustment.
Total price for this line. LineTotal = LinePrice + OrderAdjustment + ShippingAdjustment.
List price of an unit of order line item.
Total adjustments applied on this order line because of order total rule or coupon distribution.
Percent uplift or discount on the ListPrice.
The quantity of item associated with the order line.
Total shipping adjustment associated with the line. For an order line ShippingAdjustment = ShippingChargeAdjustment + ShippingSurcharge.
Total adjustments applied on this order line because of shipping charge order total rule or coupon distribution.
Surcharge for this order line. This is the total of adjustments generated by shipping surcharge rules.
The unit of measure of the item.
Price of an unit of order line item. UnitPrice is computed from ListPrice , AbsoluteAdjustment and PercentAdjsutment, UnitPrice = ListPrice * ( 1 + PercentAdjustment / 100) + AbsoluteAdjustment.
Pricelist line selected for calculating UnitPrice.
ChildPricelistHeaderKey is the PricelistHeaderKey of inherited price list.

UnitPrice is computed from ListPrice , AbsoluteAdjustment and PercentAdjsutment. Formula to calculate UnitPrice is as follows.
UnitPrice = ListPrice * (1+PercentAdjustment/100) + AbsoluteAdjustment
Pricelist header for the selected price list line.
Child pricelist header for the selected price list line if inherited.
The manual adjustment, coupon or pricing rule which has resulted in this adjustment.
Total adjustment applied as because of pricing rule or coupon or the manual adjustment.
Total adjustment applicable because of pricing rule or coupon or manual adjustment.

The identifier of an adjustment.
Possible Values:
PricingRuleName - If adjustment has occurred because of a pricing rule.
CouponID - If adjustment has occurred because of a coupon.
AdjustmentID - Manual adjustment identifier provided in the input.
Adjustment for the line.
Adjustment for every unit of line item.
Quantity of items to which this adjustment is applicable.

For header level free gift promotions, indicates free gift quantity that may still be applied. If StatusMsgCode is YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED but AwardQuantity is not present, then applicable quantity is unspecified.
The charge category. This attribute is used in the input of YPMOverrideGetOrderPrice User Exit.
The name of the charge. This attribute is used in the input of YPMOverrideGetOrderPrice User Exit.
Indicates whether the adjustment is manual or not.

Valid Values:
ADD - Adds a new manual adjustment to the order.
REMOVE - Removes an existing adjustment from the order
The default behavior is ADD .

YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED Free gift was not selected or only partially selected for rule. AwardQuantity attribute indicates the free gift quantity that can be applied for this rule. None.

Indicates the status of the rule validation and application on the order. Following table lists the possible status codes:
YPM_RULE_FREE_GIFT_NOT_SELECTED Free gift was not selected or only partially selected for rule. AwardQuantity attribute indicates the free gift quantity that can be applied for this rule. None.
Action of the pricing rule which is performed to generate the adjustment.
Shipping price information of the order.
Shipping cost for this order. AdjustedShippingTotal = ShippingCharge + ShippingAdjustment.
Total shipping adjustment applied on this order. ShippingAdjustment = ShippingChargeAdjustment + ShippingSurcharge.
Shipping charge for the order.
Total shipping charge adjustment applied for this order.
Total shipping surcharge for this order. This is the sum of shipping surcharges obtained by shipping surcharge rules.
The manual adjustment, coupon or pricing rule which has resulted in this adjustment.
Total adjustment applied as because of pricing rule or coupon or the manual adjustment.
Total adjustment applicable because of pricing rule or coupon or manual adjustment.

The identifier of an adjustment.
Possible Values:
PricingRuleName - If adjustment has occurred because of a pricing rule.
CouponID - If adjustment has occurred because of a coupon.
AdjustmentID - Manual adjustment identifier provided in the input.
Quantity of items to which this adjustment is applicable.

Attribute.Name: TargetItemDesc
Attribute.Description: The Long description of the item.

Attribute.Name: TargetItemShortDesc
Attribute.Description: The short description of the item.

Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Description: The Long description of the item.

Attribute.Name: ShortDescription
Attribute.Description: The short description of the item.
